* [[nUbuntu]] or Network Ubuntu is a project to take the existing Ubuntu distribution and remaster it as a [[Live CD]] and Full Install with tools needed for [[Penetration test|penetration-testing]] servers and networks. The main idea is to keep Ubuntuâs ease of use and mix it with popular penetration testing tools. Besides usage for network and server testing, nUbuntu will be made to be a desktop distribution for advanced Linux users.
* [[OpenGEU]] is an Ubuntu based distribution with Enlightenment window manager, previously known as Geubuntu.
* [[OpenGEU]] is an Ubuntu based distribution with Enlightenment window manager, previously known as Geubuntu.
* [http://www.opentle.org/ OpenTLE] is a Thai Linux Extension based on Ubuntu, developed by NECTEC Thailand
